document_data.name: ''Mhaornathil''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mhaornathil''''' was a magical [[scimitar]] blessed by [[Rillifane Rallathil]]. It had the ability to harm [[ghost]]s. It was possessed by [[Malruthiia Chaadren]] until her death, and was inherited by [[Tsarra Chaadren]].
